STATE OF MICHIGAN
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
GRETCHEN WHITMER
LANS ING
ELIZABETH HERTEL
GOVERNOR DIRECTOR
November 27, 2024
Shawna Henry
Catholic Charities Diocese of Kalamazoo
1441 S Westnedge Ave,
Kalamazoo, MICHIGAN, 49008-1370
RE: License#: CB391001684
Dear Shawna Henry:
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced agency completed
on 11/25/2024. The renewal inspection has determined substantial compliance with
applicable licensing statutes and rules. Your license is renewed, and you will be receiving
the license in the mail. It is valid only at your present address and is nontransferable. If
you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact area manager, Jessica VandenHeuvel, at (616)204-6992.
Sincerely,
Holly Austin, Licensing Consultant
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov • (517) 335-1980

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
• Technical assistance was not requested or required.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas:
• Consultation was not requested or required.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during
this period under review.
Chief Administrator Assessment
The chief administrator did not identify any areas if non-compliance since the
agency opened in July of this year, which is consistent with the findings of this
inspection.
Financial Overview

An independent auditor's report documenting the audit of combined financial
statements was reviewed. No financial concerns were identified.
Staff Interviews
The direct care worker, supervisor, and Director were all interviewed, and all
reported they have been finalizing their processes over the past few months and,
despite building maintenance issues resulting in unexpected repairs, everything
has gone well.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency has sufficient space and equipment to provide for the delivery of
independent living youth services. The files are stored securely in a locked metal
cabinet within a locked off that is located down a hallway that requires keypad
access.
VII. FIELD ANALYST FINDINGS
Not Applicable.
VIII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes. It is recommended that the agency be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
November 27, 2024
_____________________________________
Holly Austin Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
November 27, 2024
